segment.source: Use the Select Guidance page to specify a file that contains prescriptive guidance about how to use the Package Accelerator to create a new virtual application package.
segment.target: Use the Select Guidance page to specify a file that contains prescriptive guidance about how to use the Package Accelerator to create a new virtual application package.

segment.source: The file you select must be in rich text (.rtf) (recommended) or text (.txt) format.
segment.target: The file you select must be in rich text (.rtf) (recommended) or text (.txt) format.

segment.source: You should provide detailed information about all the necessary instructions for the Package Accelerator to create a virtual application package.
segment.target: You should provide detailed information about all the necessary instructions for the Package Accelerator to create a virtual application package.

segment.source: For example, if you are performing a media installation, you can include information about how to extract files from any self-extracting executable programs.
segment.target: For example, if you are performing a media installation, you can include information about how to extract files from any self-extracting executable programs.

segment.source: You should also provide information about all the dependent packages or any applications that must be installed for the package to run on target computers.
segment.target: You should also provide information about all the dependent packages or any applications that must be installed for the package to run on target computers.

segment.source: This page contains the following elements:
segment.target: This page contains the following elements:

segment.source: Click Browse to specify the file that contains information about how to apply the Package Accelerator.
segment.target: Click Browse to specify the file that contains information about how to apply the Package Accelerator.
